content:
If you'd like to log in using your email, please set your own password.
Once ready, please click the button below.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message asking users to set their own password after selecting an email login option in a social authentication welcome dialog. The text appears below a button prompt, guiding users through the next step. It should be translated for all mobile devices.

usage.context:
<Text textAlign="center" lineHeight="20px" className="welcome-text">
 {currentDeviceType === DeviceType.mobile ? (
 <Trans
 t={t}
 i18nKey="SocialAuthWelcomeDialog:ClickButtonBelow"
 ns="SocialAuthWelcomeDialog"
 components={{
 br: <span style={{ display: "none" }} />,
 }}
 />

 br: <span style={{ display: "none" }} />,
 }}
 />
